name: My Dream Girl
description:
Are you looking for a fun and relaxing game to kill some time? That’s a crazy coincidence, because it’s been looking for you! Start out by clicking on the girl, earn XP and gold, spend it to upgrade your characteristics, earn new items that will help you find new ways to give pleasure. Feel the power as you grow exponentially!
Game Features:
- This game is aiming to make you relax and enjoy your time.
- Get beautiful rewards as you progress (new skins for your girlfriend)
- Upgrade your skills
- Beautiful 3D art
- Relaxing mood
